ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: If collected on the CRF, the sponsor provides instructions to ensure the data is entered as intended.

ReferenceDocuments.name: HOSCAT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Sponsor-defined Controlled Terminology. This would most commonly be pre-printed on the CRF or screen and pre-populated in the data management system. This is not typically a question to which the site would provide an answer. HOSCAT can only be used if there is an HOCAT and it must be a subcategorization of HOCAT.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-10 ak Released per governance approval. 2/19/20 tmt transferred ownership from NRDS to NCI Standards/BMaeske and restored CSIs. 11-26-19 tmt removed NCI CSI, associated with NRDS CSI and changed Registration Status. 11-25-19 tmt transferred ownership from NCI Standards to NRDS/BMaeske. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.24.18
